Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Special Category/Infectious Disorder/Tropical Disease/Yaws/Late Yaws
Record.Description: Late yaws is the tertiary, non-contagious stage of yaws, endemic tropical treponemal nonvenereal infection. Late yaws is characterized by destructive and deforming lesions of the skin, bones, and joints.
